price: Nígbà náà, ó ju ọ̀pá rẹ̀ sílẹ̀, ó sì di ejò pọ́nńbélé.
arabic: فَأَلۡقَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِيَ ثُعۡبَانٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-alqā ʿaṣāhu fa-idhā hiya thuʿ'bānun mubīnun
